pages.text: Huwa Al-Ladhi Khalaqakum Min Turabin Thumma Min Nutfatin Thumma Min `Alaqatin Thumma Yukhrijukum Tiflaan Thumma Litablughu 'Ashuddakum Thumma Litakunu Shuyukhaan Wa Minkum Man Yutawaffa Min Qablu Wa Litablughu 'Ajalaan Musammaan Wa La`allakum Ta`qiluna
Huwa Al-Ladhi Yuhyi Wa Yumitu Fa'idha Qađa 'Amraan Fa'innama Yaqulu Lahu Kun Fayakunu
Alam Tara 'Ila Al-Ladhina Yujadiluna Fi 'Ayati Allahi 'Anna Yusrafuna
Al-Ladhina Kadhabu Bil-Kitabi Wa Bima 'Arsalna Bihi Rusulana Fasawfa Ya`lamuna
Idhi Al-'Aghlalu Fi 'A`naqihim Wa As-Salasilu Yushabuna
Fi Al-Hamimi Thumma Fi An-Nari Yusjaruna
Thumma Qila Lahum 'Ayna Ma Kuntum Tushrikuna
Min Duni Allahi Qalu Đallu `Anna Bal Lam Nakun Nad`u Min Qablu Shay'aan Kadhalika Yuđillu Allahu Al-Kafirina
Dhalikum Bima Kuntum Tafrahuna Fi Al-'Arđi Bighayri Al-Haqqi Wa Bima Kuntum Tamrahuna
Adkhulu 'Abwaba Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Fabi'sa Mathwa Al-Mutakabbirina
Fasbir 'Inna Wa`da Allahi Haqqun Fa'imma Nuriyannaka Ba`đa Al-Ladhi Na`iduhum 'Aw Natawaffayannaka Fa'ilayna Yurja`una
